ModMetaData.name: Cannibal and Insect Meals
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img]
Adds cannibal and insect versions of all base meals.
General [list] [*] Add these recipes/meals: Pemmican, Kibble, Simple Meal, Fine Meal, Lavish Meal, Packaged Survival Meal [*] Has added texture on the original textures to indicate cannibal-version. [*] Stats and nutritions are the same as the original meals [/list]
Compatibilities - Compatible with existent saves and other mods.
Contributors - Cerrendel
Alien races supported (Thanks to @Cerrendel) [list] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=959780399]Argonians of Blackmarsh[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1611790118]Ferian Race[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1465072243]Fantasy Goblins[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1400238872]Lord of the Rims - Dwarves[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1400234784]Lord of the Rims - Elves[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1400227853]Lord of the Rims - Hobbits[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1541567184]Ni'Hal[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1548578482]Ni'Hal - No Drakes[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1541519487]Orassans[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1572211791]Orassans Lite[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1403998409]Tree People[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1134410589]Orc Playable Race[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1119191638]Beast Man Tribes[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1783636077]Gerzee Race[/url] [/list]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
